title: nimishamaina
sahitya:
nimishamaina Sri Rama yanarAdA
nityamugAdee mAnava janmamu
(nimisha)

anupallavi

amita mahimagala vAdani rAmuni
Aa mahA devudey sannuthinchundagA
(nimisha)

caraNam

harihara mantramunaku jeevavarNatmakudu
suraripu rAvaNuni nigrahinchinavAdu
paramabhaktulanella pAlinchuvAdu
parama purushudathadey vasudevudani telisi
(nimisha)
